org.xbmc.api.data

Interface IClient

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IControlClient, IInfoClient, IMusicClient, IPictureClient, ITvShowClient, IVideoClient
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ControlClient, InfoClient, InfoClient, MusicClient, MusicClient, TvShowClient, VideoClient

    public interface IClient
    This is the interface between the business layer and the presentation layer. All the business layer gets to see is this interface. Common interface for all clients
    Author:
    Team XBMC
